properties.areaDesc: Floyd, IN; Oldham, KY; Jefferson, KY; Clark, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 10:45AM EST by NWS Louisville KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky...

Ohio River at McAlpine Upper
Ohio River at McAlpine Lower

affecting the following counties in Indiana...Clark...Floyd...
Harrison and in Kentucky...Hardin...Jefferson...Meade...Oldham.

.Rain over the last several days will cause the river to rise.

The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Ohio River at McAlpine Upper.
* from Friday afternoon until further notice.
* At 10:00 AM Thursday the stage was 19.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 23.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Friday afternoon and continue
to rise to near 26.5 feet by Monday morning.
* Impact...At 27.0 feet...River Road floods at many locations from 3rd
St. to Glenview. Blankenbaker Lane closes south of River Road.
River Dell Rd. floods at Mellwood Ave. Riverside Dr. floods at many
locations.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 26.6
feet on Mar 12 2011.
properties.instruction:
If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions.
Additional information is available at
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lmk.
